summary: A small retexture of the horker tusk. NOT THE HORKER ITSELF!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]


I made this retexture after looking around everywhere to find a better quality version of the horker tusk, as I have a horker dagger that I love and that that covers a chunk of the screen, but the horribly blurry low resolution texture (256x256) being thrown in my face all the time was driving me up the wall... 

So, here you are, a whopping 2048x2048 optimized retexture of the horker tusk! You can choose that one or a smaller, 1024x1024 version. I know it's not an amazing job, and for something so small, it may not be worth it for some, but I made this one for myself and I'm leaving it here in case anybody else may want to use it too.

Seriezs made a video that showcases the new textures at 04:21, so be sure to take a look!
[youtube]xHAyzTaBL4c[/youtube]


The bow in the last screenshot is an outdated version of a bow made by Ghosu. Get the newer and awesomer version [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47831//?]here[/url], or grab the whole Horker Weapon Pack [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48557/?]here[/url]!

Original texture © [url=http://www.lughertexture.com/stone-plates-and-ornaments-textures-download/marble-and-granite-stone-surface/medieval-stone-blocks-surface-from-athen-4-1364#joomimg]LugherTexture[/url]. To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your "Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" folder. That's it, no esp required. Have fun!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
